title: Otro turno de noche
plot: Maca is very busy with her new work as the boss of Urgency an feels agobied with Vero, who wants to spend more time with her. Susana's VIH portator ex-boyfriend, Luis, has begun to develop the illness and is at hospital. Héctor tells her and the both find out that Luis has a new girlfriend and hasn't told her about the VIH. Susana thinks that maybe he already knows he was portator when they were together (although Luis had told he didn't know) and decides to tell his new partner. Isabel's daughter, Arancha, has an accident with her friend's motorbike after having been drinking at street. He kills a men and he friend, who went also in the moto, is grave. Isabel changes the blood in order to protect her child. Vilches is treating a bulimic adult woman while his son Guillermo is in love to Alicia and tries to begin a relationship with her after the night they spent together when Alicia was drunk. She doesn't know how to explain Guille that there is nothing between they both. Lola and Claudia want to know if the other is already with Aimé, while he is worried about what people said about him when he was director of the hospital. It is been celebrated the annual competition of poker in the hospital and Maca, who has always participated in precedent years, have doubts about it when is asked for Isabel. Finally, Lola wins Rai.
stars: Jordi Rebellón, Patricia Vico, Antonio Zabálburu
